item.title: DECKERS OUTDOOR CORP 10-K
item.description: DECKERS OUTDOOR CORP, which is in the Rubber & Plastics Footwear [3021] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 28, 2021 had 35740 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 339 instances march - 307 instances 31 - 307 instances 2021 - 305 instances financial - 299 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
